mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MESSENGER (MESSAGE_NO, ATTACHMENT_NO, SENDER_NO, RECEIVER_NO, TITLE, SEND_TIME, CONTENT, STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_MES.NEXTVAL,NULL, #{senderNo}, #{receiverNo}, #{title}, SYSDATE, #{content}, 'Y')

INSERT INTO MESSENGER (MESSAGE_NO, ATTACHMENT_NO, SENDER_NO, RECEIVER_NO, TITLE, SEND_TIME, CONTENT, STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_MES.NEXTVAL, SEQ_ATT.CURRVAL, #{senderNo}, #{receiverNo}, #{title}, SYSDATE, #{content}, 'Y')
mapper.select: SELECT MESSAGE_NO,M.NAME AS name, D.NAME AS departmentName ,MEMBER_NO,TITLE, SEND_TIME, RECEIVE_TIME, CONTENT, ORIGIN_NAME, UPDATE_NAME FROM MESSENGER S JOIN MEMBER M ON S.SENDER_NO = M.EMP_NO JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON M.DEPARTMENT_NO = D.DEPARTMENT_NO LEFT JOIN ATTACHMENT A ON S.ATTACHMENT_NO = A.ATTACHMENT_NO WHERE RECEIVER_NO = #{empNo} AND S.STATUS= 'Y' ORDER BY RECEIVE_TIME DESC
